tool_description: Create beautiful customized, colored, QR Code in svg, pdf, png, jpeg, webp format.

api_list.name: Create beautiful QR code in one request
api_list.description: This endpoint creates your QR code as an image in various formats and with multiple customization options.

required_parameters.name: content
required_parameters.description: The URL or text content to encode in the QR code.

optional_parameters.name: logo
optional_parameters.description: Base64 encoded image to include as a logo in the QR code.

optional_parameters.name: eyeFrameColor
optional_parameters.description: Color of the eye frame of the QR code.

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Output format of the QR code image.

optional_parameters.name: cellType
optional_parameters.description: Type of cells in the QR code.

optional_parameters.name: eyeBallType
optional_parameters.description: Type of eyeballs in the QR code.

optional_parameters.name: eyeRotate
optional_parameters.description: Whether to rotate the eyeballs.

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: Size of the QR code image in pixels.

optional_parameters.name: colorGradientFromOffset
optional_parameters.description: Offset for the color gradient start.

optional_parameters.name: backgroundGradientToOffset
optional_parameters.description: Offset for the background gradient end.

optional_parameters.name: backgroundGradientAngle
optional_parameters.description: Angle of the background gradient.

optional_parameters.name: useEyeFrameColor
optional_parameters.description: Whether to use the specified eye frame color.

optional_parameters.name: backgroundGradientTo
optional_parameters.description: Color at the end of the background gradient.

optional_parameters.name: useEyeBallColor
optional_parameters.description: Whether to use the specified eyeball color.

optional_parameters.name: useColorGradient
optional_parameters.description: Whether to apply a color gradient.

optional_parameters.name: backgroundGradientFrom
optional_parameters.description: Color at the start of the background gradient.

optional_parameters.name: eyeBallColor
optional_parameters.description: Color of the eyeballs in the QR code.

optional_parameters.name: background
optional_parameters.description: Background color of the QR code.

optional_parameters.name: color
optional_parameters.description: Main color of the QR code.

optional_parameters.name: eyeFrameType
optional_parameters.description: Type of the eye frame.

optional_parameters.name: shake
optional_parameters.description: Whether to add a shake effect to the QR code.

optional_parameters.name: backgroundGradientType
optional_parameters.description: Type of the background gradient.

optional_parameters.name: colorGradientAngle
optional_parameters.description: Angle of the color gradient.

optional_parameters.name: colorGradientTo
optional_parameters.description: Color at the end of the color gradient.

optional_parameters.name: backgroundGradientFromOffset
optional_parameters.description: Offset for the background gradient start.

optional_parameters.name: useLogo
optional_parameters.description: Whether to include a logo in the QR code.

optional_parameters.name: colorGradientFrom
optional_parameters.description: Color at the start of the color gradient.

optional_parameters.name: useBackgroundGradient
optional_parameters.description: Whether to apply a background gradient.

optional_parameters.name: colorGradientType
optional_parameters.description: Type of the color gradient.

optional_parameters.name: colorGradientToOffset
optional_parameters.description: Offset for the color gradient end.
